reviewText: 2 disc set covers the entire race. The battle between Boonen and Cancellera is epic.

The Ronde is my favorite race; classics or grand tour. The long winding lead-up through the Belgian countryside before the punchy climbs is fantastic, and the climbs themselves are truly engaging. The 20120 race features two monters of this generations of cyclist facing off mono a mano for the last 30 km. Boonen vs. Cancellera.
